casebody.data:
Tuesday, May 13, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

97-831. Clagg v. Baycliffs Corp.

Ottawa App. No. OT-96-023. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for injunction pending appeal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for injunction pending appeal be, and hereby is, denied.
